description: Mutual mistake as to basic assumption
facts: Seller contracted to sell painting believed to be a copy
Both parties believed painting was a reproduction
Painting later discovered to be original worth $1,000,000
asp_facts: contract(c1). mutual_mistake(c1, yes). basic_assumption(c1, authenticity). material_effect(c1, yes). risk_allocated(c1, no). mistake_known_at_formation(c1, no). subject_matter(c1, painting). sale_amount(c1, 100). actual_value(c1, 1000000).
question: Can the seller rescind the contract?
rationale: A mutual mistake as to a basic assumption on which the contract was made makes the contract voidable. Both parties were mistaken about the painting's authenticity, a basic assumption that materially affects the exchange.
